General.Name: Peugeot Invest SA
General.Description: Peugeot Invest Société anonyme operates as an investment company. The firm invests in private equity and real estate funds. The firm also invests in governance, social, and environmental protection. The company was formerly known as FFP Société anonyme and changed its name to Peugeot Invest Société anonyme. Peugeot Invest Société anonyme was incorporated in 1929 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
General.Address: 66 avenue Charles de Gaulle, Neuilly-sur-Seine, France, 92200
